bill_title: modify hours of employment for children under fourteen years of age.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to modify hours of employment for children under fourteen years of age. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 60-12-2 be AMENDED: 60-12-2. No A child under fourteen years of age may not be employed at any time in any factory, or workshop, or about any mine,. nor be employed in A child under fourteen years may not be employed in any mercantile commercial establishment, except during hours when the child's own school or other educational program is not in session and, but in no case after seven o'clock nine p.m. Violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
